pr_title: Changed alert level of mapstruct warning "unmappedTargetField" from WARN to ERROR

timeline.bodyText: I think we can set the config globally. Add the following argument to the compiler -Amapstruct.unmappedTargetPolicy=ERROR
timeline.author: sergii-iakovenko

timeline.message: Changed alert lavel of compile warning "unmappedTargetField" from WART to ERROR
Changed alert lavel of compile warning "unmappedTargetField" from WART to ERROR
